titles.title: Hawaiian Home Lands Preservation Act
Hawaiian Home Lands Preservation Act
To amend the Hawaiian Homes Commission Act, 1920, to reduce the minimum blood quantum for successor lessees and applicants on the Application Waiting List, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Hawaiian Home Lands Preservation Act
This bill reduces the minimum Native Hawaiian blood quantum required for successor homestead lessees and applicants on the waiting list for the Hawaiian Home Lands program.
